TEXT.BODY: Shr 38 cts vs not given Net 8,616,000 vs not given Revs 209.1 mln vs 169.8 mln Nine mths Shr 1.76 dlrs vs not given Net 34.5 mln vs not given Revs 632.0 mln vs 551.5 mln NOTE: Year ago per share and net income not available as company recapitalized on December 28, 1986 after it became a new reporting entity for financial reporting purposes.
